snippet.title: Survive: Forgotten and Abandoned|Official 'Wishlist Now' Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you step into the shoes of Stanley Bell, a man haunted by his past. Six months have elapsed since the outbreak, and Stanley must navigate a world filled with mind-bending hallucinations and grotesque monsters. Survive in a nightmarish landscape where every turn could be your last as you confront your deepest fears.
Wishlist on Steam:https://store.steampowered.com/app/2615270
